pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/moj-analytical-services/dataengineeringutils3/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/moj-analytical-services/dataengineeringutils3?branch=master)# Data engineering utils - Python 3Fully unit tested utility functions for data engineering. Python 3 only. ## Installation```bashpip install dataengineeringutils3```## Testing```bashpytest --cov-report term-missing --cov=dataengineeringutils3 tests/```
